posts.post_title: LTB - T213-2 Leach -Chicago & Chance New York
posts.post_content:
Looking for a couple T213 Type 2 cards, not really picky on condition, just something with little or no paper loss.

Leach - Chicago
Chance - New York  - looking for either batting or Portrait

 You can PM me or email me at [url]SteveA@tractorpartsasap.com[/url] if you have anything available.

Thanks,
Steve
